item.title: This Is Liam
item.description: Liam doesn’t believe me that this was posted to the internet.

item.title: Hugo and GitHub Pages-My Definitive Opinion
item.description: So you want to deploy a site on GitHug Pages and you don’t want to use Jekyll?

item.title: Why Hugo?
item.description: Why Hugo? I was hoping to learn some Go. This is being hosted by github pages, so I wanted to learn more about static page generators.

item.title: I made a site and it needed some content.
item.description: When one is stuck at home due to the Covid’s and busy chasing two 9 year olds around and yet needs to stay up to date on technologies and show that one is employable, maybe they should create some things for people to look at.

item.title: This is about me.
item.description: i like to do somethings. other things i don’t like to do.
